task.title: How to setup CryptoGuard Wallet
task.shortdesc: In this guide you will learn how to Set Up your CryptoGuard Wallet. This adds additional secuirty to your assets.

step.cmd: After Installing CryptoGuard, open the folder which CryptoGuard is installed then click on the CryptoGuard.exe icon.
This will take you to the home screen of CryptoGuard. First you need to enter your prefered password. Use atleast 8 characters also use symbols and numbers. Click Next.

Next page will show you your unique seed. Seed is a 12-word recovery phrase that you can use to restore your wallet in case you forget your password or loose access to it. Write this on paper and store it in a safe place. Click Next.
Next page will ask you to type your seed. After typing your seed click Next.

taskbody.result: You have successfully Set Up your CryptoGuard wallet.
